# Checklists

## PR Author

- [ ] **I only modified YAML files**<br/>
      (or, I reviewed _all_ Terraform plans/checks when the PR modifies _any_ other file type)

## PR Reviewer

- [ ] **I carefully reviewed all YAML changes and assert only YAML was changed**<br/>
      (or, I reviewed _all_ Terraform plans/checks when the PR modifies _any_ other file type)
